taK8wZaKfNJW90KBX.name: Constriction Attack
taK8wZaKfNJW90KBX.notes: If you succeed on a grapple against an opponent no larger than your own SM, on your next turn, and each successive turn, roll a Quick Contest of your ST vs. your victim’s ST or HT, whichever is higher. If you win, your victim takes damage equal to your margin of victory; otherwise, no damage is inflicted

mgd9ccAJvexgknMez.name: Oxygen Storage
mgd9ccAJvexgknMez.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

myNRdchvuftT-rupH.name: Oxygen Storage
myNRdchvuftT-rupH.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mHQom7awIb-GwZG-V.name: Oxygen Storage
mHQom7awIb-GwZG-V.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mmCnfjVWcBTdBjjzw.name: Oxygen Storage
mmCnfjVWcBTdBjjzw.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

maK47dELBBTc3UjEQ.name: Oxygen Storage
maK47dELBBTc3UjEQ.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mqlRLYAI6pKeDFhkD.name: Diffuse
mqlRLYAI6pKeDFhkD.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mCdUfzrcXgz-2wLHP.name: Homogenous
mCdUfzrcXgz-2wLHP.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mfToKRCT05g949GBA.name: No Blood
mfToKRCT05g949GBA.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mRyzLXQEtRxXN_P2N.name: No Brain
mRyzLXQEtRxXN_P2N.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mU7rbafUP02eNKQ2-.name: No Eyes
mU7rbafUP02eNKQ2-.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m2WrGeMB_17tctMVn.name: No Head
m2WrGeMB_17tctMVn.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mvwcrl0gdgq1Gh8GL.name: No Neck
mvwcrl0gdgq1Gh8GL.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mhwITwkG0NvS8Tj7L.name: No Vitals
mhwITwkG0NvS8Tj7L.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mJ_g5U7M6q1XDLvDr.name: Unliving
mJ_g5U7M6q1XDLvDr.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mCM1ZEC79AiFY5e6c.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mvcuk4Dvatf1Nsehg.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mG1A6sG6aZkbbwf7C.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
